overview:
Anthony Argenziano is the founder and CEO of iLogon Inc. Anthony started iLogon in April 2008, and since that time has worn many hats.

Anthony is focused on building a strong management team, while working the early business development activities, obtaining funding, and advancing the company operations.

Anthony has been in the technology industry for over 15 years, having worked for companies such as Intel, ImageTag, Artisoft, and several other startups and Fortune 500 organizations. Throughout his career, Anthony has managed hundreds of successful software and technology projects, as well as building and maintaining world class operations.

Anthony holds an MBA from The WP Carey School of Business and a BA from Ottawa University. He lives in Phoenix, AZ Area with his wife and two children.
